channel.title: Changing object names
channel.description:
Hey guys, I wasn't sure where this should go, because I don't know if it would be server side or client side, so I thought if I put it here there would be no harm done :)
Anway, is it possible to change the name of an object. For instance, could I change the name of a portal to "Godwars Portal". And another portal to "KBD Portal".
Thanks for any help. ~ Dai

item.title: Changing object names
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

Okay, thanks a lot Mitko. Like I said, I didn’t know if this was client or server sided. But, now I do.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Changing object names
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Ye, add this in class46.java with the others:
if(i == ####) { //// the object's id you want to change name class46.aString739 = "Teh name"; class46.aByteArray777 = "Examine goes here.".getBytes(); }
If you don’t have any other custom objects just look for:

class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753); And add it under it.
And you could have posted this in Client Help

Read full topic
